arm_group.description: All patients who underwent stem cell mobilization after chemotherapy and G-CSF at our institution between 2002 and 2013

brief_summary.textblock:
Stem cell mobilization procedures after chemotherapy and G-CSf performed at our Institution
      between 2002 and 2013 were reviewed in order to define prognostic factors for optimal
      harvest

clinical_study.brief_title: Peripheral Blood CD34-positive Cells Enumeration as Predictor of Stem Cell Harvest

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Mobilization with chemotherapy and G-CSF

          -  Years 2002-2013

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  mobilization with G-CSF alone

          -  mobilization with plerixafor

clinical_study.official_title: Peripheral Blood CD34+ Cells Count as Predictor of Stem Cell Harvest After Chemotherapy and G-CSF. A Single Center Experience

primary_outcome.description: Patients not able to harvest at least 2x10e6 CD34+/Kg in the specified time frame are considered failures
primary_outcome.measure: Blood Stem cell harvest failure rate

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective
